name: GetActivityById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Activity by id/number.

$ul:
**costPriceMarkupPercentage**: If cost prices are utilized on employees, this can be used to determine a markup percentage for the given activity.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**cutoffDate**: Date where price should change from before to after.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**groupNumber**: The number of the activity group that this activity belongs.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**hideInSearch**: Hides an activity from employees when registering in e-conomic UI.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**inLieuCode**: If time in lieu is used, this defines which code the activity should utilize when registered upon.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**isAccessible**: Defines whether the activity can be registered upon.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**name**: Name of the activity.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the activity.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**salesPriceAfter**: Price to be used after defined cut off date if defined.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**salesPriceBefore**: Price for a given activity. This will be utilized if no special price is defined.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logId**: The unique log identifier of the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**message**: Short description about the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**property**: The property name in case of validation logic issue.

Filterable: not filterable
